SEARCH
Package edu.ui.travelAgentCreateReservations

Class TravelAgentCreateReservationController

java.lang.Object
edu.ui.travelAgentCreateReservations.TravelAgentCreateReservationController
public class TravelAgentCreateReservationController extends Object
Controller class for handling travel agent interactions related to reservation creation. This class provides methods for obtaining information needed for reservation creation, such as checkout dates, available cruises, available rooms, and user details. It also handles the process of creating reservations and checking the existence of a username.
